analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0x8c39afdf7b17f12c553208555e51ab86e69c35aa.sol:
	Contract FR8 has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x8c39afdf7b17f12c553208555e51ab86e69c35aa.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_token' of FR8.reclaimToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x8c39afdf7b17f12c553208555e51ab86e69c35aa.sol) is not in mixedCase
